Title: Dr. Yap
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu, Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (story editor), Kelvin Yu (story editor), Scott Jacobson (story editor), Holly Schlesinger (story editor), Wendy Molyneux (story editor), Nora Smith (story editor), Steven Davis (story editor)

Plot: When a drugged Bob kisses Gayle thinking she's Linda, Gayle develops a crush on him.
